name: lab-dash
description: This is an open-source user interface designed to manage your server and homelab

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.preinstall: cd ./backend && npm install && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json backend/node_modules backend/package-lock.json
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
